snippet.title: The Karters 2: Turbo Charged - Announcement Trailer | Official Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
The Karters 2: Turbo Charged - an ultimate blend of Mario Kart and Crash Team Racing! 
Join Discord community👉 https://discord.gg/TheKarters
Wishlist Now On Steam👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2269950/The_Karters_2_Turbo_Charged/


Coming soon to Steam & Steam Deck | PS4, PS5 | Xbox One, Series X/S | Switch!


Check out the gameplay reveal trailer for The Karters 2: Turbo Charged - an upcoming reboot of the game that was initially released in 2018.
At the beginning of 2023, we're planning to kick off beta tests and we strongly encourage you to join! ( discord.gg/TheKarters )

As an indie studio based in Poland, our team of 8 passionate developers has been working hard for over 4 years to bring you a fast-paced and engaging kart racing experience.
Our main inspiration was the kart racing legends like Mario Kart 8 and Crash Team Racing, and our goal was to create an outstanding kart racer also available for Steam, Steam Deck, and all major console platforms in 2023! 

If you enjoyed this trailer, don't forget to give it a Like and share it with your friends!
